description:
Gorilla works at a sushi restaurant, and helps the chief chef and his son reconcile their differences in a way only a gorilla can.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment Gorille devint cuisinier dans un restaurant de sushi et ce qui en suivit
Gorilla`s Sushi: A Record of Success Through Excellence
ゴリラの寿司 -豪腕繁盛記-
